article.Heading: Rail Budget 2016: Would watch out for allocation hike in railway capex, says L&T
article.Summary: In a CNBC-TV18 interview, Umesh Chowdhary, VC & MD, Titagarh Wagons and Rajeev Jyoti, Chief Executive, Railway Business, L&T shared their expectations from the Rail Budget 2016.
article.Body:
In a CNBC-TV18 interview, Umesh Chowdhary, VC & MD, Titagarh Wagons and Rajeev Jyoti, Chief Executive, Railway Business, L&T shared their expectations from the Rail Budget 2016.

For entire discussion, watch video...
